title: Arata naru Sekai: World's/Start/Load/End (World's End)
synopsis: Four high school girls in uniforms walk silently on the barren earth. These girls are time travelers who had been sent 6000 years into the future, from their present in which the same day is endlessly repeated, in order to evade human extinction.
related_anime: ['Arata naru Sekai: Gendai-hen', 'Arata naru Sekai: Kako-hen']
voices: ['Iguchi, Yuka', 'Taneda, Risa', 'Kimura, Ryouhei', 'Uchiyama, Yumi', 'Nagata, Yoriko', 'Ookubo, Rumi']
